item.title: 10 Jan 2018 14:25
item.description: Yesterday was a terrific day at #climbing! Was able to scale the 5.6 auto-belay one's with decent ease and had a pretty good body form while scaling the sloped 5.7 on a manually belayed line. With just three days left for the monthly pass to expire, seriously considering renewing the membership. ðŸ”— )
item.content:encoded: Yesterday was a terrific day at #climbing! Was able to scale the 5.6 auto-belay one's with decent ease and had a pretty good body form while scaling the sloped 5.7 on a manually belayed line. With just three days left for the monthly pass to expire, seriously considering renewing the membership. ðŸ”— )
